name: Diegozeng's Home Page
body:
## **Background**

***
* [University of Macau](http://www.umac.mo/)    
 B.S., Electrical and Electronic Engineering, 2010-2014
* [University of California, Irvine](http://www.uci.edu/)  
 M.S., Computer Engineering, 2014-2016 (expected)

***
## **Experience**

***
* [INESC Macau](http://www.inesc.pt/files/pages/inesc.php), Research Assistant
* [IST Austria](https://ist.ac.at/), Visiting Scientist 
* [New Oriental Education & Technology Group](http://english.neworiental.org/publish/portal59/), Teacher Assistant

***
## **Research**

***
1. Bio-signal processing and analysis 
   * [ECG feature points detection](https://github.com/diegozeng/ECG-analysis-and-identification)
   * PCG (Heart sound signal) denoising
   * [Hippocampal Sharp Wave Ripple (SWR) detection on CA1/CA3 region](https://www.dropbox.com/s/0hucuaul57ud8n5/Poster%EF%BC%88A0%EF%BC%89.pdf)
2. Applications on Embedded system / Microprocessor / DSP / FPGA   
   * 8051 series (AT89C52/C8051F340)
   * AVR (ATmega328) [Arduino Uno](http://arduino.cc/en/Main/arduinoBoardUno)
   * ARM (SAM3X8E) [Arduino Due](http://arduino.cc/en/Main/arduinoBoardDue)
3. Data Science 
   * Machine learning
   * Data Mining

***
## **Curriculum Vitae** 

***
* [English version](https://www.dropbox.com/s/cni3f5odnol2to0/Tao%20Zeng%20CV.pdf)
* [Chinese version](https://www.dropbox.com/s/fof7xsw1ut5sl6e/%E4%B8%AD%E6%96%87%E7%AE%80%E5%8E%86%28130925%29.1.pdf)

***
## **Publications**

***
* Tao ZENG, JiaLi MA, BinBin FU, and MingChui DONG, “_An Exploration of Dynamic Threshold Wavelet Shrinkage Method for Heart Sound Denoising_”, accepted to be published in the 3rd International Conference on Electronics Engineering and Informatics (**ICEEI 2014**), Bali, Indonesia, September 2014. 

***
## **Blog**

***
[苏伊士运河底](http://blog.csdn.net/tiegozeng) (Chinese version)

***
